div.p: FHIR Dev Days 2018 - FHIR Testing Track - FHIR v3.0.1 Capability Options Suite JSON

description.value: FHIR Dev Days 2018 - FHIR Testing Track - FHIR v3.0.1 - Capability Options test suite against a single server to verify support for the capabilities interaction 'HTTP OPTIONS' and the return of a valid CapabilityStatement resource using JSON format.

Test the HTTP OPTIONS capabilities operation with HTTP Header Accept set to JSON format and no request URL parameters defined. The expected response content is the found CapabilityStatement resource in JSON format.
HTTP OPTIONS capabilities operation with HTTP Header Accept set to JSON format and no request URL parameters defined. The response asserts for all the optional HTTP Headers will be warning only.
Confirm that the returned HTTP status is 200(OK).
Confirm that the returned HTTP Header Content-Type is present.
Confirm that the returned HTTP Header Content-Type contains the FHIR mime-type 'application/fhir+json'.
Confirm that the returned HTTP Header Content-Type contains 'charset=utf-8'.
Confirm that the returned HTTP Header ETag is present. Warning only as FHIR servers SHOULD return this header.
Confirm that the returned resource type is CapabilityStatement.
Confirm that the returned CapabilityStatement conforms to the base FHIR specification.
Confirm that the returned CapabilityStatement resource minimally contains the declaration of a RESTful server.
